attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of the economy is precarious and inflation is rising. Britain's streets are more dangerous than ever. Poorer families are worse off after the penultimate budget. Our personal information is unsafe and our civil liberties are being eroded and legislated upon by the day, not least by the Lisbon Treaty which is a botched EU constitution-on the introduction of which we were promised a referendum. All this has happened under a Labour government. Mr Brown, you say you're listening to the public-why don't you call a general election and let us tell you what we want?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
